titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 437: Classified list of angels' names

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Each name followed by a sof pasuḳ; paragraphs endings denoted by three spaces; Recto contains a list of names of angels who are in motion (יוסייריה) at night; verso contains a list of names of angels who are in motion by daylight.
Condition: fragment, damaged, losses from upper and lower margins, faded, stained.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 14; ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
